org.apache.commons.io

类 LineIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.io.LineIterator
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String>

    public class LineIterator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String>, java.io.Closeable
    An Iterator over the lines in a Reader.

    LineIterator holds a reference to an open Reader. When you have finished with the iterator you should close the reader to free internal resources. This can be done by closing the reader directly, or by calling the close() or closeQuietly(LineIterator) method on the iterator.

    The recommended usage pattern is: 

     LineIterator it = FileUtils.lineIterator(file, "UTF-8");
 try {
   while (it.hasNext()) {
     String line = it.nextLine();
     // do something with line
   }
 } finally {
   it.close();
 }
    从以下版本开始:
    1.2

    • 构造器详细资料

      • LineIterator

        public LineIterator(java.io.Reader reader)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs an iterator of the lines for a Reader.
        参数:
        reader - the Reader to read from, not null
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the reader is null

    • 方法详细资料

      • hasNext

        public boolean hasNext()
        Indicates whether the Reader has more lines. If there is an IOException then close() will be called on this instance.
        指定者:
        hasNext 在接口中 java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String>
        返回:
        true if the Reader has more lines
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if an IO exception occurs

      • isValidLine

        protected boolean isValidLine(java.lang.String line)
        Overridable method to validate each line that is returned. This implementation always returns true.
        参数:
        line - the line that is to be validated
        返回:
        true if valid, false to remove from the iterator

      • next

        public java.lang.String next()
        Returns the next line in the wrapped Reader.
        指定者:
        next 在接口中 java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String>
        返回:
        the next line from the input
        抛出:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if there is no line to return

      • nextLine

        public java.lang.String nextLine()
        Returns the next line in the wrapped Reader.
        返回:
        the next line from the input
        抛出:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if there is no line to return

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Closes the underlying Reader. This method is useful if you only want to process the first few lines of a larger file. If you do not close the iterator then the Reader remains open. This method can safely be called multiple times.
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.io.Closeable
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.lang.AutoCloseable
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if closing the underlying Reader fails.

      • remove

        public void remove()
        Unsupported.
        指定者:
        remove 在接口中 java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String>
        抛出:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - always

      • closeQuietly

        @Deprecated
public static void closeQuietly(LineIterator iterator)
        已过时。 As of 2.6 removed without replacement. Please use the try-with-resources statement or handle suppressed exceptions manually.
        Closes a LineIterator quietly.
        参数:
        iterator - The iterator to close, or null.
        另请参阅:
        Throwable.addSuppressed(java.lang.Throwable)
